org.resthub.core.service

Interface GenericService<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Domain model class managed, must be an Entity
    ID - Primary key class of T
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupService, RoleService, UserService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTraceableServiceImpl, GenericServiceImpl, GroupServiceImpl, RoleServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl

    public interface GenericService<T,ID extends Serializable>
    Generic Service interface.

    • Method Summary

      • deleteAll

        void deleteAll()
        Delete all existing resource. Do not use cascade remove (not a choice -> JPA specs)

      • deleteAllWithCascade

        void deleteAllWithCascade()
        Delete all existing resource, including linked entities with cascade delete

        Parameters:

        limit - limit (default 100)
